voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order
Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order
Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order
Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: Hola, estoy aquí con su pedido de DoorDash
Are you Maria?
Are you Maria?
Are you Maria?
Are you Maria?
¿Es usted María?

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: Aquí está su pedido de Chipotle. Todo está en la bolsa.

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Careful, there are drinks in here
Careful, there are drinks in here
Careful, there are drinks in here
Careful, there are drinks in here

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: Cuidado, hay bebidas aquí adentro

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: You're all set. Have a great day!
You're all set. Have a great day!
You're all set. Have a great day!
You're all set. Have a great day!

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: Está todo listo. ¡Que tenga un excelente día!
'You're all set' significa 'ya está todo'. Es una forma natural de decir que la entrega está completa. Terminar con 'Have a great day' deja una buena impresión.
'You're all set' significa 'ya está todo'. Es una forma natural de decir que la entrega está completa. Terminar con 'Have a great day' deja una buena impresión.

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order.
Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order.

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: Are you Maria?
Are you Maria?

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Great! Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Great! Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Careful, there are drinks in here.
Careful, there are drinks in here.
You're all set. Have a great day!
You're all set. Have a great day!

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: ¿Escuchaste cómo suena natural? Ahora lo escucharás una vez más con pausas para que repitas cada frase.

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order
Hi, I'm here with your DoorDash order

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: Are you Maria?
Are you Maria?

voice.name: en-US-JennyNeural
voice.prosody: Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Here's your order from Chipotle. Everything is in the bag.
Careful, there are drinks in here
Careful, there are drinks in here
You're all set. Have a great day!
You're all set. Have a great day!

voice.name: es-MX-DaliaNeural
voice.prosody: ¡Excelente trabajo! Cada vez que practicas, tu confianza crece.
